FindModule.h

00001 #ifndef FIND_MODULE_H
00002 #define FIND_MODULE_H
00003 
00004 #include <omnetpp.h>
00005 
00012 template<typename T = cModule *const>
00013 class FindModule
00014 {
00015   public:
00022     static T findSubModule(const cModule *const top)
00023     {
00024       for (cModule::SubmoduleIterator i(top); !i.end(); i++) {
00025         cModule *const sub = i();
00026         // this allows also a return type of read only pointer: const cModule *const
00027         T dCastRet = dynamic_cast<T>(sub);
00028         if (dCastRet != NULL)
00029           return dCastRet;
00030         // this allows also a return type of read only pointer: const cModule *const
00031         T recFnd = findSubModule(sub);
00032         if (recFnd != NULL)
00033           return recFnd;
00034       }
00035       return NULL;
00036     }
00037 
00044     static T findGlobalModule() {return findSubModule(simulation.getSystemModule());}
00045 
00052     static cModule* findHost(cModule *const m) {
00053       cModule* parent = m != NULL ? m->getParentModule() : NULL;
00054       cModule* node   = m;
00055 
00056       // all nodes should be a sub module of the simulation which has no parent module!!!
00057       while( parent != NULL && parent->getParentModule() != NULL  ) {
00058         node   = parent;
00059         parent = node->getParentModule();
00060       }
00061       return node;
00062     }
00063     static cModule* findNetwork(cModule *const m) {
00064       cModule* node = findHost(m);
00065 
00066       return node ? node->getParentModule() : node;
00067     }
00068     // the constness version
00069     static const cModule* findHost(const cModule *const m) {
00070       const cModule* parent = m != NULL ? m->getParentModule() : NULL;
00071       const cModule* node   = m;
00072 
00073       // all nodes should be a sub module of the simulation which has no parent module!!!
00074       while( parent != NULL && parent->getParentModule() != NULL  ) {
00075         node   = parent;
00076         parent = node->getParentModule();
00077       }
00078       return node;
00079     }
00080     static const cModule* findNetwork(const cModule *const m) {
00081       const cModule* node = findHost(m);
00082 
00083       return node ? node->getParentModule() : node;
00084     }
00085 };
00086 
00091 template<typename T = cModule>
00092 class AccessModuleWrap
00093 {
00094   public:
00095     typedef T wrapType;
00096   private:
00097     T* pModule;
00100     AccessModuleWrap(const AccessModuleWrap<T>&);
00103     AccessModuleWrap<T>& operator=(const AccessModuleWrap<T>&);
00104 
00105   public:
00106     AccessModuleWrap() : pModule(NULL)
00107     {}
00108 
00109     virtual ~AccessModuleWrap() {};
00110 
00111     T* get(cModule *const from = NULL)
00112     {
00113       if (!pModule) {
00114         pModule = FindModule<T*>::findSubModule( FindModule<>::findHost(from != NULL ? from : simulation.getContextModule()) );
00115       }
00116       return pModule;
00117     }
00118 };
